channel.title: Lag issues?
channel.description:
This may help: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGhEVyPEYXk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kGhEVyPEYXk[/url]
i used the optifog mog and really helped performance. if u can install the latest java7 that also helps, and last [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cofafyvOhuM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cofafyvOhuM[/url] when the bug in the optifog full gets fixed im going to use. u have to mess around with the settings i guess for the optifog.
hope that helps. without the java7 im getting ~15 fps with a 256 texture pack.
